hooks.command: bash -c 'FILE=$(echo "$CLAUDE_TOOL_INPUT" | grep -o "docs/[^"]*slides-data\.json" | head -1); if [ -n "$FILE" ] && [ -f "$FILE" ]; then ACTUAL=$(bun -e "const d=JSON.parse(require(\"fs\").readFileSync(process.argv[1],\"utf-8\"));console.log(d.slides?d.slides.length:0)" "$FILE" 2>/dev/null); echo "üìä Slide count: $ACTUAL slides in $FILE"; fi'

bash -c 'FILE=$(echo "$CLAUDE_TOOL_INPUT" | grep -o "docs/[^"]*\.json" | head -1); if [ -n "$FILE" ] && [ -f "$FILE" ]; then bun -e "try { JSON.parse(require(\"fs\").readFileSync(process.argv[1],\"utf-8\")); console.log(\"‚úÖ JSON valid: $FILE\"); } catch(e) { console.error(\"‚ùå JSON parse error in $FILE: \" + e.message); process.exit(1); }" "$FILE" 2>&1; fi'

bash -c 'BROKEN=$(grep -rn "src=\"assets/" docs/*/dist/*.html 2>/dev/null); if [ -n "$BROKEN" ]; then echo "‚ö†Ô∏è Broken asset paths found in dist/ HTML:"; echo "$BROKEN"; exit 1; fi; echo "‚úÖ Asset paths OK"'

bash -c 'FOUND=$(grep -rn "url(#" docs/**/*.svg 2>/dev/null); if [ -n "$FOUND" ]; then echo "‚ö†Ô∏è Prohibited url(#id) references found in SVG files:"; echo "$FOUND"; echo "Run: bun run scripts/fix-svg-url-refs.ts"; exit 1; fi; echo "‚úÖ SVG url(#id) check passed"'

bash -c 'FOUND=$(grep -rn "^\`\`\`mermaid" docs/**/*.md 2>/dev/null); if [ -n "$FOUND" ]; then echo "‚ö†Ô∏è Unconverted Mermaid blocks found:"; echo "$FOUND"; exit 1; fi; echo "‚úÖ No Mermaid blocks"'

hooks.prompt: If this was a long conversation (20+ messages), remind the user to run /compact to reduce context size. Keep it brief and friendly.
